body: Will anyone be going to Minecon 2016? It's on September 24-25 and is held in Anaheim, California. My grandma lives there, so I might being able to go! There is rumors that the cape will be purple with an enchantment table! I hope I can go and maybe see you there too!
body_tagged: Will anyone be going to Minecon 2016? It's on September 24-25 and is held in Anaheim, California. My grandma lives there, so I might being able to go! There is rumors that the cape will be purple with an enchantment table! I hope I can go and maybe see you there too!
title: Minecon 2016

replies.body: Don't have the time and I couldn't care less lol. Have fun if you go though
